questions.describe:
The automated case user will be listed in the case history for all case actions except when the
case is

What must an administrator do to schedule and email reports?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Specify the report location in a personal folder
Specify a link to the reports

questions.describe:
Which object is a standard object?
*Choose 3 answers *
Person accounts and business accounts can be accessed via Accounts tab. To create a view that only displays person accounts, one must

answerOptions.describe: Filter based on the field "Is Person Account"
Add the contract related list to the account page layout
Select the "View All Data" permission on the user profile
Set the access for the contact object to "Controlled by Parent"

questions.describe: When are active custom validation rules evaluated?

answerOptions.describe: When feedback to the end user is not required
When there are no errors in standard validations
When the page layout contains no required fields
When inline editing has been enabled for the organization

questions.describe: Which statement is TRUE regarding how Salesforce allocates storage space?

answerOptions.describe: Custom objects are not counted against data storage allocation
Data storage includes space used by files in the Documents tab
A user may continue to create records when storage capacities limits are exceeded by 5%

If you import or add a large number of records, your organisation's storage usage will not
be updated immediately

questions.describe: Which method should be used to migrate 65.000 records from one organization to another, including accounts, contracts, lead, and opportunities?

Which attributes can be used when matching similar opportunities?
*Choose 2 answers*
Which is not a step when creating a custom application?

When a case is deleted, which related items are also deleted?
*Choose 2 answers*
An administrator would like to export a report to a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet and maintain the report format. To do this, the administrator should click on which button?

Which information is maintained on the user record and can be modified by the user?
*Choose 3 answers*
Which validation rule validates that a custom date field, My_Date__c, contains a date within the current year?
Assuming the recycle bin limits have not been reached, how long does a user have to recover deleted data from the recycle bin before it is permanently deleted?

answerOptions.describe: Deleted data cannot be recovered from the recycle bin
Data remains in the recycle bi for an unlimited amount of time

questions.describe:
When authenticating a user through the user interface, what does Salesforce validate before allowing a user to access the application?
*Choose 3 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Whether the user's profile is API enabled
Whether the organization has trusted IP addresses
Whether the user's profile has login hour restrictions
Whether the user's profile has IP address restrictions

questions.describe:
Assuming only standard relationships, which option is available when customizing the mini‐view of the console?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: From the Contact Object, the user can choose Cases
From the Opportunity Object, the user can choose Campaign
From the Cases Object, the user can choose Account and Contact
From the Opportunity Object, the user can choose Account and Contact

questions.describe:
Which option below gives an end user the ability to import leads for the organization and associate the leads to a campaign?
*Choose 2 answers*
Which statement is FALSE regarding object relationships?

answerOptions.describe: The lookup relationship field is not required in the page layout
Each custom object can have up to two master‐detail relationships
A standard object cannot be on the detail side of the relationship
The security settings for the detail record control the master record

questions.describe: Users want to view report output for all opportunities that own and that are owned by users who report to them via the role hierarchy. To proceed they should verify that

answerOptions.describe: They have the "Manage Public Reports" permission on their profile.
The profiles of all users report to them in the role hierarchy and that the "My Team's opportunities" filter is used when running opportunity reports
The correct users report to them in the role hierarchy and that the "My Team's Opportunities" filter is used when running opportunity reports.
The correct users report to them in the role hierarchy and that the "My Team‐Selling and My Own Opportunities" filter is used when running opportunities reports.

questions.describe: Which Salesforce feature should be used to disable access to all objects in a custom application?
Which statement about multi‐day and all‐day events is TRUE

answerOptions.describe: All‐Day Events have a start and end time
Multi‐Day Event cannot be set as All‐Day Event
All‐Day Events have a check box for flagging as Multi‐Day Events
Multi‐Day Events have a start and end time

questions.describe: If the organization‐wide default on accounts is set to public read/write, what can be used to limit access to these records?

Currencies are defined at which level?
*Choose 3 answers*

When a user with pending approval requests leaves an organization, what can administrator do with the pending requests?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Change the approval process routing steps

questions.describe: If a record has been manually shared with read/write access, the user will be able to do which of the following?

answerOptions.describe: Change the owner of the record
Share the record to another user with full access

questions.describe: Which item cannot be stored in a folder?

If a record that matches the criteria of a workflow rule is created on July 1 and the close date is July 30, the time‐dependent action is scheduled for July 23. However, what happens if the opportunity is edited before July 23 and no longer meets the criteria?

answerOptions.describe: The time‐dependent action is put on hold
The time‐dependent action is sent on July 23
The time‐dependent action is sent on July 30
The time‐dependent action is automatically removed from the queue

questions.describe: Which UI component allows easy access to recent tags?

Which statement is TRUE regarding record types?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Record types can be hidden from users
Record types are controlled by the page layout
Record types can only be assigned to one profile at a time
Record types can be used to define different picklist values for different types of users

questions.describe: Charting is a report option that can be used on

answerOptions.describe: Matrix and custom report types only
